Name: De Soepboer
Review Text: Very welcoming, laid back and great value. Limited menu options, but all organic and well made. Traditional European dishes the way they were intended.

Name: De Soepboer
Review Text: Although the soup looked amazing, ended up with a sandwich, which was very good. Relaxed atmosphere and good price

Name: De Soepboer
Review Text: Excellent food, decent prices and tres friendly staff.

Review Text: Good food, nice soups, friendly staff!

Review Text: It was the only place ever that gave me real soul food here in Amsterdam.
